mapper.select: select user_id, nick_name, email, phone, profile_img from user where email=#{email} and pwd=password(#{password})
SELECT user_Id , email, phone, nick_name, reg_date , profile_img FROM user where not user_id = 1
select user_id, email, phone, nick_Name from user u where nick_name like CONCAT('%',#{nickName},'%');
select user_id, email, phone, nick_Name from user u where nick_name = #{nickName};
select user_id, email, phone, nick_Name from user u where email = #{email};
select user_id, email, phone, nick_Name from user u where phone = #{phone};
SELECT user_Id , email, phone, nick_name, reg_date FROM user u where not user_id = 1
select user_id, email, phone, nick_name, profile_img from user where user_id=#{userId}
SELECT i.invited_nickName, i.travel_name FROM invite i , user u WHERE i.user_nickName = u.nick_name and u.nick_name = #{nickName}

SELECT d.destination_id , di.img FROM likes l , destination d, destination_img di WHERE l.destination_id = d.destination_id and d.destination_id = di.destination_id and d.user_id =1 and l.user_id = #{user_id}
